categories.name: Funding Adequacy & Policy
categories.definition: Risks from insufficient statutory or actual contributions, funding methods, and unfunded liabilities undermining long‑term plan solvency.

categories.name: Actuarial & Measurement Risk
categories.definition: Risks from actuarial assumptions, demographic experience, valuation methods, timing, and data/estimate errors that change reported liabilities.

categories.name: Market, Liquidity & Valuation
categories.definition: Risks from market movements, interest rates, currency, illiquid investments, redemption restrictions, and asset valuation (NAV) uncertainty.

categories.name: Credit, Counterparty & Concentration
categories.definition: Risks of loss from issuer or counterparty default, custodial failures, collateral practices, derivatives counterparties, and concentrated exposures.
criteria: Credit derivative and written protection exposures

categories.name: Operational, Legal & Governance
categories.definition: Risks from inadequate policies, controls, technology, cybersecurity, legal/legislative changes, contingent obligations, and disclosure failures.
criteria: Operational and technology failures or transitions
Contingent benefit provisions and disclosure/stress testing gaps
